channel.title: (718/742) Custom whip not animating, is it my model?
channel.description:
I've added all the definitions and everything like that to the server, and when i packed the model into the cache, i copied the normal abyssal whip as a base - however, the whip just kind of sits in my hand, curled up. Thanks in advance for any help. Also, before anybody says it, I HAVE googled the issue extensively, i've been trying to get it to work for the past 3 hours. No joke.
Here is a download of the model in dat format, and mqo https://www.dropbox.com/sh/61dd87jd368z9in/AACzShjNLCWGF0FwnKXoGpj9a?dl=0
And here's a screenshot [img]http://i.imgur.com/teXmUwu.jpg[/img]

item.title: (718/742) Custom whip not animating, is it my model?
item.dc:creator: @grandstinger grandstinger
item.description:
@grandstinger wrote:

I believe it’s your model.

If you have exported your animated dat to mqo atall, then you need to export your animated dat to mqov2 instead to keep the animation on the model for when you remake the mqo a dat.

When exporting to mqo you lose the animation.

When exporting to mqov2 you keep the animation.

Read full topic
item.source: (718/742) Custom whip not animating, is it my model?
